unnormalised: Arrey yaar, did you update your KYC with your PAN no. and IFSC code? SBI is asking everyone to do it by 31/12 or else account block ho jayega!
normalised: Arrey yaar, did you update your K-Y-C with your P-A-N number and I-F-S-C code? S-B-I is asking everyone to do it by thirty first december or else account block ho jayega!
